MOVE.DESCRIPTION: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
Relaxes the body to sharply boost Speed.
An ancient power is used to attack. It may also raise all the user's stats.
An attack using a startling shout. It also may make the foe flinch.

MOVE.WHO: Markuska; Jason; Quinn; Clegg; Shorts Kid;
MOVE.DESCRIPTION: Bites with vicious fangs. May cause flinching.
A fiery kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also burn the foe.
A spray of bubbles hits the foe. It may lower the foe's Speed stat.
Bulks up the body to boost both Attack and Defense.
Grips the target in the attacker's shell for two to five turns.
A sinister ray that confuses the foe.
A psychic attack that may cause confusion.
Raises Defense and Sp. Def with a mystic power.
The foe is crunched with sharp fangs. It may lower the foe's Sp. Def.
Evades attack| but may fail if used in succession.
A life-risking tackle that also hurts the user.
A double-kicking attack that strikes the foe twice.
The foe is hit with an incredible blast of breath that may also paralyze.
A mystical dance that ups Attack and Speed.
Steals HP from a sleeping victim.
The foe is punched with the user's full power. It confuses the foe if it hits.
The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.
The user explodes to inflict terrible damage even while fainting itself.
An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.
Draws the foe close| then strikes without fail.
A fiery punch that may burn the foe.
The foe is scorched with intense flames. The foe may suffer a burn.
Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.
Rakes the foe with sharp claws| etc.| 2 to 5 times.
The user growls in a cute way| making the foe lower its Attack. stat.
Chimes soothingly to heal all status abnormalities.
The user howls to raise its spirit and boost its Attack stat.
Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.
A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn.
A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.
The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.
Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.
The foe is given an intimidating look that lowers its Defense.
Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.
A low| tripping kick that inflicts more damage on heavier foes.
Attacks with a burst of light. May lower Sp. Def.
Fixes the foe with a mean look that prevents escape.
A strong punch thrown with incredible power.
The foe is attacked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack.
Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise Attack.
Waggles a finger to use any Pokémon move at random.
Hurls mud in the foe's face to reduce its accuracy.
Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.
Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.
An attack with a mirage that inflicts damage matching the user's level.
Pounds the foe with forelegs or tail.
Evades attack| but may fail if used in succession.
A powerful psychic attack that may lower Sp. Def.
The foe is attacked with an odd| hot energy wave that varies in intensity.
An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.
Boosts the power of Water-type moves for 5 turns.
A high-speed spinning attack.
Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.
The user sleeps for two turns to fully restore HP and heal any status problem.
Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.
A lot of sand is hurled in the foe's face| reducing its accuracy.
Frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed.
Scratches the target with sharp claws.
Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe's Defense.
The user blows up to inflict severe damage| even making itself faint.
Slams the foe with a long tail| vine| etc.
Slashes with claws| etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
The foe is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.
An obscuring cloud of smoke or ink reduces the foe's accuracy.
A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.
Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe's last move.
A reckless| full-body throw attack that also hurts the user a little.
Emits bizarre sound waves that may confuse the foe.
Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.
Charges the foe with a full-body tackle.
The user wags its tail cutely| making the foe lower its Defense stat.
A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.
A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.
A brutal lightning attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.
An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.
Squirts water to attack the foe.
Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe.
The user soaks itself with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
Strikes the foe with wings spread wide.
A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.
Same as Scratch

MOVE.USELESS_TEXT: BOX tried to move|[delay 4] but it could not.[halt] Boxes don't move.

MOVE.DESCRIPTION: Same as Focus Energy
Same as Quick Attack
Same as Pound

MOVE.USELESS_TEXT: SHORTS KID: Hey|[delay 6] I'm not a Dikémon![halt] Fuck off!
SHORTS KID: Have I told you about my shorts?[halt] They're comfy and easy to wear!
EGG tried very hard to become a chicken|[delay 6] but it was too late.

MOVE.DESCRIPTION: Same as Dragon Dance
Same as Recover

MOVE.USELESS_TEXT: You tied the SHOEs laces![halt] Great job!
The smell of the TALL GRASS reminded you of your dad when he used to cut the lawn!
TALL GRASS moved slightly in the breeze.
